title: Texting Titan
description: Dating a football player isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. When you find your boyfriend cheating on you with not one, but two girls it leaves scars.But what about when you find the guy who is willing to heal those scars?The problem is they are both teammates. Oh and I only know the second guy by the name Titan, he's been texting me for weeks and it could be anyone on the team. Will his team loyalty win out over saving me when I need it most? READ NOW!This is a Sweet, Steamy, Small Town, Second Chance, College Football Romance. No Cliffhangers.As always there is a satisfying Happy Ever After.If you love steamy romances with second chances, secret admirers, hot love scenes, small towns, and football, then this one is for you.
author: Kaci Rose
